forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning, becoming all snow for the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 41F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers this evening. Clearing skies later. Low -9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers this evening. Clearing skies later. Low 17F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely after midnight. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow developing after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low 31F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 31F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 28F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to a mixture of light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.
